ygData.subject: Re: Level 12 spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops, I misread.. I thought he said Shieldskin.. ya resistant skin is lvl 12..and a good spell to get. Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard ... From: Karl Hatteland
ygData.messageBody:
Oops, I misread.. I thought he said Shieldskin.. ya resistant skin is lvl
12..and a good spell to get.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>

Date: Friday, May 07, 1999 10:07 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Level 12 spells

Bind
